example.code:
PS C:\> Get-SSMMaintenanceWindowExecutionTaskInvocationList -TaskId "ac0c6ae1-daa3-4a89-832e-d384503b6586" -WindowExecutionId "518d5565-5969-4cca-8f0e-da3b2a638355"

TaskExecutionId : ac0c6ae1-daa3-4a89-832e-d384503b6586 WindowExecutionId : 518d5565-5969-4cca-8f0e-da3b2a638355 WindowTargetId :
example.description: This example lists the invocations for a task executed as part of a maintenance window execution.
